name: RIGO Men Olive Waffle Knit Solid Polo T-Shirt
description: RIGO presents men's Polo T-shirts made from rich textured Waffle Knit fabric. The Olive Solid Polo T-shirt is a versatile fall/winter wardrobe essential, perfect for your outgoing look. Crafted with a classic design, this t-shirt offers timeless style and wearability. This t-shirt features solid pattern, polo collar with no buttons, full sleeves, straight hem, and a regular fit. Wear it with your favorite jeans for a stylish look that makes you the perfect companion for the season. Elevate your wardrobe with this timeless piece.

name: U.S. POLO ASSN. Engineered Oxford Shirt
description: You'll look effortlessly stylish in this classic Oxford shirt, featuring a button-down collar and engineered stripes on the chest.

name: Dragon Hill Full Sleeves Carbon Grey Birdeye Weave Cotton Plain Shirt
description: Dragon Hill Full Sleeves Carbon Grey Birdeye Weave Cotton Plain Shirt With Button Down Collar

name: BULLMER Yellow & Blue Trendy Colour Block Fleece Hoodie Sweatshirt for Men
description: Best Value, Superior Quality, Stretchable, Comfort Wear, Comfort-Fit, Soft Inner and Outer Finish, Adopts to Cold and Semi Cold Conditions, Trendy Prints & Color Blocked, Rib in Sleeve and Hem

name: Loudless Men Cavalry Printed Half Shirt
description: Made from 100% cotton, LoudLess shirts are proudly designed and crafted in India. Bringing a collection of prints that showcase a unique signature print style like never before. The fabric soft, and the fit is regular. Each shirt is a masterpiece, featuring a captivating story behind its design. Whether you're traveling, attending parties, or simply enjoying a casual outing, our shirts are perfect for any occasion

name: AD By Arvind Men Dark Green Tailored Fit Geometric Patterned Three Piece Suit (Set of 3)
description: A finely tailored suit is a key component of a modern gent's wardrobe, and this version embodies generations of tailoring expertise. The notch lapel collar and a single-breasted profile give it a streamlined look, while the unfinished trouser hems can be altered to your preferred length. You can't go wrong teaming it with a simple tie and polished brogues.

name: Alcis Yellow Solid Slim Fit Round Neck VIROPROTKT T-Shirt
description: Lend a contemporary edge to your attire with this yellow slim fit t-shirt from Alcis. Fabricated from polyester fabric, this t-shirt has a round neck and short sleeves. Curate a fashionable look by pairing it with jeans, a denim jacket, and sneakers.

name: Peter England Men Red Regular Fit Solid High Neck Jacket
description: Peter England Men Red Blended Fabric Solid Regular Fit Zipper Slit Pocket Full Sleeves High Neck Jacket

name: Urbano Fashion Men White Cotton Slim Fit Casual Checks Shirt
description: Make heads turn & be a style icon in this unique & fashionable Urbano Fashion men's cotton (50% Polyester, 50% Cotton) White checkered shirt with full front buttoned placket, which brings the latest trend for the fashion conscious. The in-vogue & classy checks design & slim collar, soft & premium cotton fabric with bio-wash, full sleeve, custom fit & curved hem - epitomizes style with comfort making it a wardrobe must-have. Pair this uber-cool and popular full sleeve checked shirt with any Urbano Fashion jeans or chinos for the perfect casual, office, or party wear look, and never go out of style!

name: Levi's Levis Mens Slim Fit Jeans
description: Flaunt your classic style by opting for this trendy pair of Levi's Men's Slim Fit Jeans. Designed with a solid pattern, these blue jeans will lend you a distinctive look. This pair of jeans is made from denim material and features a slim fit.

name: AD By Arvind Pure Cotton Rinsed Denim Jacket
description: Layer up in leisure and luxury with this blue jacket by AD By Arvind. Crafted with high-quality cotton, it features full sleeves closure and solid pattern along with collar neck & front pocket. Pair it with trousers and shoes to elevate your look.

name: Vastramay Mens Black Cotton Ethnic Shirt
description: Vastramay Mens Black Cotton Ethnic Shirt

name: Nykaa Fashion Curve White Solid Collared V Neck Tie Up Wrap Top
description: This sequinned wrap top features a V neckline with a tie-up, half-length bishop sleeves with cuffs and buttons and an asymmetric ruffled hemline

name: Nykaa Fashion Pep It Up Black Polka Dot Top
description: Crafted in cotton slub, this black and white polka dot printed peplum style top features a square neckline with ruffle detail, full puff sleeves with tiered elasticated and ruffle detail with a smocked yoke.

name: Black Front Open Blazer with paints
description: Black Front Open Blazer with paints.

name: MIXT by Nykaa Fashion White High Waist Ripped and Frayed Denim Shorts
description: This pair of shorts features a frayed hem, ripped detailing, a basic 5 pocket design and is high waisted.

name: MIXT by Nykaa Fashion White Solid Full Sleeves Front Pocket Shirt
description: Machine Cold Wash. Wash Dark Colors Separately. Do Not Bleach. Do Not Dry Clean. Do Not Tumble Dry. Warm Iron.

name: White Satin Detail Top
description: MISH White Satin Detail Top.

name: White Solid Tie Up Short Peplum Top
description: This top features a solid pattern, square neckline with tie-up straps, smocking at front and back bodice with ruffle below the waist.

name: HP Laptop AMD Ryzen 3 Quad Core 5300U
description: You can work on multiple projects at the same time with the HP 15s laptop. Featuring a display with high clarity, it provides an immersive viewing experience. Moreover, this laptop’s dual speakers offer enhanced audio. Additionally, you can accomplish all your tasks with considerable ease and on time, courtesy of the AMD processors and graphics card in this laptop. Furthermore, its light weight allows you to carry this laptop wherever you go.

name: ASUS 68.58 cm (27 inch) Full HD LED Backlit IPS Panel Gaming Monitor
description: ASUS 68.58 cm (27 inch) Full HD LED Backlit IPS Panel Gaming Monitor (VZ279HEG1R)  (Response Time: 1 ms, 75 Hz Refresh Rate)

name: SONY WH-CH520 with 50 Hrs Playtime
description: Combining long-lasting performance with personalised sound quality, the Sony WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones are an excellent addition to your day-to-day life. They boast a playback time of up to 50 hours, making them ideal for long listening sessions. Also, they feature USB Type-C quick charging, providing up to 90 minutes of playback with just 3 minutes of charging time. Moreover, these headphones come with the EQ Custom feature on the Sony Headphones Connect App, allowing you to personalise the sound to suit your preferences.

name: Canon R100 Mirrorless Camera RF-S 18-45mm
description: This Canon R100 Mirrorless Camera features a RF-S 18-45 mm lens, which provides a wide range of focal lengths for capturing everything from landscapes to portraits. With its mirrorless design, this camera offers fast and accurate autofocus, as well as the ability to shoot in low-light conditions. With Creative Assist Mode, Hybrid Auto Mode, and Silent Mode for Quiet Operation, this camera is sure to impress with its performance and image quality.

name: HOCO TG-113 Ultra 3D Dynamic Thunder Sound With High Bass Wireless Portable 9 W Bluetooth Speaker
description: 100% New collection mini handy speaker it is easy to carry and brings out the bass in your music. Its splash-proof features let you to enjoy your music anywhere indoor/outdoor. You can match it to your style quotient ,eye-catching contrast wherever it goes and easily compliments anyone’s style Portable Wireless Speaker Echo and noise cancelling features for calls Easy to operate;

name: Egate K9 Pro / EO9022 (8400 lm / 1 Speaker / Wireless / Remote Controller) Full HD 1080p Native with 4K Support
description: The Egate i9 Pro Max Full HD Android projector features 4D keystone correction to give you sharp and clear visuals. It also allows you to zoom in and out on an image with the help of a remote. It has an FHD resolution of 1920*1080p for an immersive visual experience. Thanks to its large 533 cm (210) screen that allows you to have a theatre-like experience at home. Powered by Android OS, this projector has a powerful quad-core processor and inbuilt speaker for enhanced performance.

name: OnePlus Watch 2 with Wear OS 4
description: The OnePlus Watch 2 epitomises versatility with an elegant stainless steel chassis and sapphire crystal cover, offering reliability in the wilderness and the boardroom alike. Mirroring the OnePlus 12 Series, it balances ruggedness and luxury seamlessly. Military-grade tested,

name: Canon MG2570S Multi-function Color Inkjet Printer
description: Be it for personal or professional use, the Canon PIXMA MG2570S Inkjet Printer can fulfil all your printing needs. Featuring a compact size, this printer can be conveniently stored on even small shelves and spaces. Additionally, thanks to its lightweight design, this printer can be conveniently moved from one place to another. Furthermore, for high-quality and clear prints, this printer comes with ink cartridges.

name: XIAOMI 12 Pro 5G
description: The XIAOMI 12 Pro 5G – where Pro meets perfection in design, camera prowess, and incredible technology. Prepare to be captivated by its all-new, double-sided glass body, featuring a super-narrow bezel, available in three elegant shades that redefine smartphone aesthetics.
